instructions:
Remove skin from chicken, wash and pat dry. Salt and pepper pieces and place in a dish for marinating.
Combine soy sauce, tomato sauce, oil, sugar and garlic. Pour marinade over chicken *(all or part may be
frozen at this point in sealable bags with proportionate marinade)*, and refrigerate for 24 hours. Baste
occasionally.
Place chicken pieces on a rack in a shallow baking pan and sprinkle with sesame seeds. Bake in 350
degree oven for 30 minutes, then add about 3 or 4 tbsp water to bottom of baking pan below the rack and
continue baking for an additional 18 to 20 minutes or until done. 
*(Rev. 3/29/93)*
name: Chicken Teriyaki
creator: Jan Decker
